InstantBrewing.YouWillBeAble: You will be able to create new presets later
InstantBrewing.NoDeviceDesc: No device detected. Connect new device?

Settings.Title: Settings
Settings.BluetoothConnectionError: For firmware update, connect device first
Settings.BruAppWillDownload: We will now download and install the latest firmware for your BRU Maker. Please make sure you are connected to the internet.
Settings.DoYouWant: Do you want to see the new features?

error.sendCommand: ❌ Something happened while sending the command. Please try again
error.connection: ❌ Something happened while connecting to the device. Please try again
error.disconnect: ❌ Something happened while disconnecting from the device. Please try again
error.read: ❌ Something happened while reading data from the device. Please try again
error.pleaseConnect: Please connect your BRU Maker first
error.noConnectedDevice: No device detected. Please connect and try again.

step1.text: This APP needs access to your phone to be able to connect and communicate with your device.

step2.text: We need access to your phone to be able to connect and communicate with your device.

step3.text: Connection and Location permissions are required to find and control your BRU Maker One even when the app is not in use. Without access, things may not work as expected.

step4.text: Please activate connection on your device. Got to 'MACHINE SETUP' then to 'CONNECTION' and turn it 'ON'

step6.text: Cool! We found your BRU Maker! Please activate pairing mode on your BRU Maker. Go to 'MACHINE SETUP' then to 'PAIR NEW DEVICE'. After this step you must see 'Waiting for connection' on BRU device display.

step7.text: Now we are trying to connect to your BRU Maker. Please wait a few seconds.

step8.text: Please check your BRU Maker. You need to activate pairing mode. Go to 'MACHINE SETUP' then to 'CONNECTION' and turn it 'ON'

step9.text: Your BRU Maker is successfully paired with your phone. Now you can use all features of the app :)

step10.header: We need to update your BRU Maker firmware!

Help.title: Help
Help.contactDesc: Please provide the details of your issue to our support team. We will assist you as soon as possible.
Help.modalSuccess: The request has been sent. We will contact you as soon as possible.
Help.InstallFilter: How to install a water filter?
Help.ResetPin: Where can I find the reset pin?
Help.ResetPinAnswer: The reset pin is under the drip tray.
Help.TastesDifferent: What can I do if my tea tastes different?
Help.Contact: How can I contact the customer service?
Help.OrForm: Or via the contact form below
Help.EmailPlaceholder: Please enter your email, so we can answer you!
Help.FeatureTitle: Do you have an idea for a new feature? Let us know here!

UpdateFirmware.PleaseDont: Please do not disconnect your BRU Maker One from a power source until the firmware is updated.
UpdateFirmware.UpdateCompletedDesc: Update is complete. Please wait a few seconds for BRU to reboot.
UpdateFirmware.Error: An error occured during the firmware instalation please try again later
UpdateFirmware.Old: Setting up you BRU Maker One language. Please wait.
UpdateFirmware.LanguageDone: Language is set up. Please wait a few seconds for BRU to restart

Unpair.After: After unpairing your device you have to pair it again.
